LongDescriptions.LongDescription: Excellent mountain apartments for sports- and nature-lovers wanting to share a few days with family or friends. Of particular note are the panoramic views of the surroundings, of the valley and of the mountain. The establishment has apartments of 1 and 2 bedrooms. The communal areas are ideal for relaxing with friends. The following services are offered Currency Exchange.

The apartments have Independent Heating, Soundproofing, Satellite / Cable TV , Lounge-Diner, Lounge, Sofa Bed, Kitchen, Cooker, Coffee Machine, Refrigerator, Freezer, Microwave, Kitchen Utensils, Crockery, Cutlery, Tablecloths, Table/Chairs, Bathtub, Hairdryer, Towels, Laundry Service, Dry Cleaning Service and Wi-Fi , and among our services and facilities available we have Lifts and Heating . We also have Multilingual Personnel, Currency Exchange, Ski Room, Airport Shuttle , Vehicle Rental, Wi-Fi, Tourist Information, Airport Transfer and Garage. Activities and relax: Trekking, Bicycles, Quads, Skiing, Rafting, Kayak, Bowling, Horse ride and Archery.
